>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.themes.Item.SB3HmmSnCrY6biOL]{Beastblood}

Your animalistic affinity increases. Select one of the following that best fits your ancestral animal or bestial influence.

  • @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.theme-features.Item.BntdefgQshi0eOdN]{Feline Leap}: You are as lithe as a cat. When you jump, you are always considered to have a running start, and the DC for jumping vertically is equal to twice the number of feet you are attempting to jump (instead of four times).
  • @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.theme-features.Item.Bs9x6oUyQp8uLwy7]{Lupine Tactics}: Your instincts lead you to flank foes and bring them down for the kill. When you @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.Kjba2E3Ad5oMJ7hV.JournalEntryPage.X0cZZItDqyTDLhz2]{flank} an opponent, you gain a +2 bonus to your attack roll to perform the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#trip]{trip} combat maneuver against that opponent, in addition to the benefits of flanking. This bonus does not stack with other effects that grant you a bonus to perform the trip combat maneuver.
  • @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.theme-features.Item.6VJuXWxvppNOSMlC]{Rodent Scurry}: You are adept at skittering past foes or even underfoot. When using the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.3QdtsfnVJsHEdrt0#tumble]{tumble} task of the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.3QdtsfnVJsHEdrt0]{Acrobatics} skill, you move at full speed.
  • @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.theme-features.Item.kmObmPKgGMWEhCyw]{Saurian Carnage}: Like the powerful saurian predators of worlds such as @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.setting.mkJGLfpJkvAKLZz3]{Castrovel}, you are a terror to behold, especially when you spill enemies’ blood. When you successfully @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.6fqgiVqlA7u9jS4i#demoralize]{demoralize} a creature, that creature is @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.nywSVEeDvp1bk7L3]{shaken} for an additional round, or 2 additional rounds if that creature has witnessed you killing or disabling an enemy during the current encounter.
  • @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.theme-features.Item.2zuDhOYAOF7NYMXP]{Ursine Fury}: Injuries don’t make you weak, they make you angry. While you have no Stamina Points remaining, you gain a +5 foot bonus to your speed and you do not suffer the penalty to attack rolls or AC incurred by a charge.
